title: databaseman
author: databaseman
content: So, are you ready to make your crypto website stand out? Let's get started today! Click the order button and let's take your crypto site to the moon!"Table of Packages:Package   Price   Unique OfferingsBasic   $50   - 10 high-quality backlinks- On-page SEO optimization- Keyword research- Monthly progress reportStandard   $150   - 20 premium backlinks- Comprehensive on-page SEO- In-depth competitor analysis- Bi-weekly progress reportsPremium   $300   - 40 elite backlinks- Full-site SEO overhaul- Exclusive crypto niche research- Weekly progress reportsKeyword-Based Description:"Are you seeking a powerful SEO link building service for your cryptocurrency website? Look no further! I specialize in boosting crypto sites to the top of search engine results. With tailored strategies, white-hat techniques, and a deep understanding of the crypto niche, I'll help you achieve the online visibility your project deserves.My Services Include:Customized link-building strategiesOn-page SEO optimizationIn-depth keyword researchTransparent progress reportingReady to dominate the crypto space? Let's get started!"Optimized Keywords:Crypto SEO ExpertCryptocurrency Link BuildingSEO for Crypto SitesBoost Website RankingOrganic Traffic GrowthFAQ:Q1: What is SEO link building, and why is it important for my crypto website?A1: SEO link building is a technique to acquire high-quality backlinks to your site, improving its visibility on search engines. For crypto websites, this means more organic traffic, higher rankings, and increased credibility in the cryptocurrency space.Q2: Are your link-building methods safe for my crypto website?A2: Absolutely! I strictly adhere to white-hat SEO practices, ensuring your site's long-term success and compliance with search engine guidelines.Q3: How soon can I expect to see results?A3: While SEO is an ongoing process, you'll start seeing improvements within a few weeks. Patience pays off for long-lasting results!Prerequisites/Requirements:To get started, I'll need access to your website and a brief understanding of your crypto niche. Additionally, any specific keywords or goals you have in mind will be highly beneficial in tailoring my services to your needs.Remember, I'm not just a freelancer; I'm your partner in crypto success. Let's take your crypto website to new heights together!TELEGRAM :@CRYPTOWILIE

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: You have already opened a topic offering a similar service. That can be considered spam, I see that you respected the same things in other parts of the forum.Delete the others and leave only one thread that you will keep up-to-date.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: databaseman on September 18, 2023, 08:23:36 PMRemember, I'm not just a freelancer; I'm your partner in crypto success. Let's take your crypto website to new heights together!Since you admitted that you are a freelancer it's important to show us your success rate who are your clients and give us a list of sites that you ranked and why would potential clients pick you instead of more established SEO companies, It is better to tell us if you are affiliated on SEO companies like all SEO freelancers are doing.Honestly, I have a hard time believing an SEO specialist who does not have his own site to showcase his service, and rank it in his chosen niche, if there is one, better to include it here. When it comes to SEO, results and testimonials are very important.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on September 19, 2023, 01:35:16 PMSince you admitted that you are a freelancer it's important to show us your success rate who are your clients and give us a list of sites that you ranked and why would potential clients pick you instead of more established SEO companies, It is better to tell us if you are affiliated on SEO companies like all SEO freelancers are doing.Honestly, I have a hard time believing an SEO specialist who does not have his own site to showcase his service, and rank it in his chosen niche, if there is one, better to include it here. When it comes to SEO, results and testimonials are very important.I have to partially defend the OP, that is, the SEO business in general. First, it is not to be expected that someone will publicly share information about their clients. This is not done for the protection of clients, so as not to affect their reputation. Such things can be considered inside information. There is no way to prove that someone did SEO for a certain company, website or whatever. Apart from taking their word for it or if the client himself officially announces it somewhere (but this happens very rarely).Even if you have all the reliable information that person xx did SEO for site YY, without prior knowledge (about SEO) and certain (paid) tools, you cannot determine the quality of the SEO work performed.Backlinks are what he needs to prove. Their quality and method of creation.However, what exposes the OP is his offer. He persistently offers backlinks, some of which he calls premium. Now I responsibly claim that it is not possible to get 10 "high-quality" backlinks for $50 (let's ignore the fact that his specific service comes with it). Or even 40 "elite" BL. for $300.Just imagine, for example, CMC+Coingecko+38 and other "elite" sites sharing $300 for backlinks to some new and unproven crypto site...  What the OP doesn't say is that bad backlinks cause penalties from Google, and it's very difficult to correct that later.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.created_time: September 19, 2023, 02:43:42 PMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 02:55:24 PM by robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on September 19, 2023, 02:01:40 PMQuote from: robelneo on September 19, 2023, 01:35:16 PMSince you admitted that you are a freelancer it's important to show us your success rate who are your clients and give us a list of sites that you ranked and why would potential clients pick you instead of more established SEO companies, It is better to tell us if you are affiliated on SEO companies like all SEO freelancers are doing.Honestly, I have a hard time believing an SEO specialist who does not have his own site to showcase his service, and rank it in his chosen niche, if there is one, better to include it here. When it comes to SEO, results and testimonials are very important.I have to partially defend the OP, that is, the SEO business in general. First, it is not to be expected that someone will publicly share information about their clients. This is not done for the protection of clients, so as not to affect their reputation. Such things can be considered inside information.There is no way to prove that someone did SEO for a certain company, website or whatever. Apart from taking their word for it or if the client himself officially announces it somewhere (but this happens very rarely).No bro he should go check Fiverr and you should see how these SEO specialist do their SEO, they show their graph and they show clients they worked with, not only on Fiverr but all freelance sites, and if it's an SEO company they have client page like this SEO companies that displayed their clients on their homepage https://cnetinfosystem.com/assured-seo.aspOP's offer is incomplete I was looking for a platform where he can showcase his work like Fiverr or another freelance platform since he mentioned he is a freelancer or something like PM me for my works and my past clients like this SEO companiesI always maintain when it comes to SEO you should be transparent because it's a highly competitive niche it's not what he promised to do but what are the results from his past clients that he can provide.We may not have a different perspective on this but I always maintain that SEO is all about past achievements and how you do it based on the graph that you can provide to your potential clients.Chill bro for this good discussionCode:https://www.fiverr.com/awaisshab117/provides-high-authority-da-90-plus-seo-dofollow-backlinks
